note.p: French governess. May have been employed for Elizabeth Gaskell (Lily) Norton, when Norton was staying with her aunt and uncle, Sara and William Erasmus Darwin, in Bassett, Southampton, 1880â€“1. Employed by the Langmores, neighbours of William Erasmus Darwin, in 1891.
